import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "../img/logo7.svg"; import { Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, NavbarText, } from "reactstrap"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, Redirect, useHistory, useLocation, } from "react-router-dom"; const Example = (props) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); const [auth, setAuth] = useState({ loggedIn: false, token: "" }); return (
HOME GENRE Mordern Traditonal Folk Devotional Classic ABOUT CONTACT
{auth.loggedIn ? ( Book List ) : ( <> Login Sign Up )}
); }; export default Example;
